_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
dn20:2.4: four deities of the Pure Abodes
before^dn20:5.13^who_around: a large Saṅgha of around five hundred mendicants, most of the deities from ten solar systems
dn20:6.13+dn20:20.12^where_else_mentione: Kapilavatthu, Himalayas, Mount Sātā, Vessamittā, Rājagaha, Mount Vepulla, Dhataraṭṭha, Virūḷhaka, Virūpakkha, Kuvera, Cittasena, Nābhasa, Pāyāga, Yamunā, Namuci, Bali, Water, Earth, Moon
dn20:6.13+dn20:20.12^who_else_mentioned: Kumbhīra, King Dhataraṭṭha, Indra, King Virūḷha, Lord of the goblins, King Virūpakkha, King Kuvera, Kuṭeṇḍu, Viṭeṇḍu, Viṭucca, Viṭuḍa, Candana, Kāmaseṭṭha, Kinnughaṇḍu, Nighaṇḍu, Panāda, Opamañña, Mātali, Nala, Pañcasikha, Timbaru, Suriyavacchasā, Vesālī, Tacchakas, Kambalas, Assataras, Erāvaṇa, Buddha, Vajirahattha, Vāsava, Kālakañjas, Dānaveghasa, Veroca, Rāhu, Varuṇa, Vāruṇa, Soma, Yasa, Veṇhu, Sahali, Asama, Yamas, Sun, Sakka, Sahabhū, Ariṭṭhakas, Rojas, Sūleyyas, Vāsavanesi, Samānas, Mahāsamānas, Mānusas, Mānusuttamas, Hari, Lohitavāsīs, Pāragas, Mahāpāragas, Sukkas, Karumhas, Veghanasas, Odātagayhas, Vicakkhaṇa, Sadāmattas, Hāragajas, Missakas, Pajjuna, Khemiyas, Tusitas, Yāmas, Kaṭṭhakas, Lambītakas, Lāmaseṭ, Jotis, Subrahmā, Paramatta, Sanaṅkumāra, Tissa, Brahmā, Issarās, Hārita
before^dn20:22.11^who_around: the disciples, the gods, the Brahmās
